price: Gökten belli bir ölçüde su indirdik. Onu yeryüzünde tuttuk. Onu gidermeye de elbette gücümüz yeter.
arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī al-arḍi wa-innā ʿalā dhahābin bihi laqādirūna
translations: then We cause it to settle
